title: Senior Real Estate Accountant
description: We are looking for a Senior Real Estate Accountant to join our asset management team. You will be responsible for full-cycle accounting for our residential and commercial real estate portfolios. Your tasks include property-level financial reporting, service charge and ancillary cost accounting (Nebenkosten) for commercial and residential assets, monthly and annual closing processes, and coordination with property managers and asset managers. You will prepare financial statements and support external audits under IFRS and Swiss GAAP FER. The role is based in Zurich with flexible working arrangements.
required_skills: Experience as Real Estate Accountant or Property Accountant is mandatory. Strong background in financial accounting including general ledger, accounts payable and receivable. Hands-on experience with property portfolio accounting covering commercial and residential assets. Knowledge of IFRS and Swiss GAAP FER. Proficiency in accounting software such as Abacus, SAP (FI or RE-FX), Yardi, or MRI. Advanced Excel skills for financial modelling and reporting. Service charge / Nebenkosten accounting experience. Monthly and annual closing processes. Preparation of financial statements and audit documentation. German language minimum B2.
required_education: Bachelor or Master degree in Accounting, Finance, or Business Administration with focus on accounting. Federal Diploma in Accounting (Fachausweis Finanz- und Rechnungswesen) or CPA or equivalent professional qualification. Solid foundation in financial accounting and reporting standards.
